spec_data.Name: lv2-vocoder-plugins
spec_data.Description:
Perhaps you don't know what a vocoder is, but you have heard one before for
sure. Vocoders are often used to add a robotic effect to vocals in music.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 03:39:39 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Add a robotic effect to vocals
